meanings.definition: A person appointed to assist a deputy.
meanings.sent1: The subdeputies helped the deputy with his paperwork.
meanings.sent2: The sheriff appointed several subdeputies to aid him in maintaining order.
meanings.sent3: The subdeputies accidentally mixed up all the files, causing chaos in the office.
meanings.sent4: The subdeputies were the loyal shadows of the deputy, always by his side.
meanings.sent5: The diligent subdeputies diligently carried out their duties with precision.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals appointed to assist a deputy.
meanings.sent1: The team of subdeputies worked together seamlessly to support the deputy.
meanings.sent2: The subdeputies gathered every morning for a briefing before starting their tasks.
meanings.sent3: The subdeputies decided to surprise the deputy by decorating his office with balloons.
meanings.sent4: The subdeputies formed a protective shield around the deputy during the protest.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated subdeputies were always ready to jump in and help the deputy at a moment's notice.
